# Sweat and Shine Watch - Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
Apple Watch companion app for "Sweat and Shine" fitness tracking app.
- watchOS app with SwiftUI
- Firebase Firestore integration
- Display exercises, timer, and workout progress
- Minimal iOS bridge app

## Project Details
- Platform: watchOS 10+, iOS 17+
- Language: Swift, SwiftUI
- Backend: Firebase Firestore
- Color Palette: #b5ffe9, #c5e0d8, #ceabb1, #c9c9c9, #444545
